report.title: Temporary Cure of My Headaches
report.author: Triptamine
report.bodytext: I have been experiencing medium to intense headaches for about 1 1/2 years as of now (11/02). I most often notice the headaches when reading, watching a movie, or working on the computer. When they are at their strongest point, I cannot read or look at something any longer. It seems as though there is tremendous pressure in my eyes or like my eye muscles are completely sore and tired. I have been to doctors numerous times, but they cannot find the problem. /n /n Recently, I have found complete relief from these headaches by using psilocybin. Some times the relief lasts several days - maybe up to a week. I also found that DMT also works at low dosages (10-30mg). I wonder...Has anyone else found relief in these substances? Does anyone use these or other medications on a regular basis to control headaches? /n /n Triptamine
